text.text: How do I configure emsCharts to communicate with ZOLL Billing?

text:
To enable emsCharts to talk to ZOLL Billing, two areas need to be configured:

* NEMSIS v3 Webservices
* Code tables

NEMSIS v3 Webservices
NEMSIS v3 Webservices are configured by ZOLL and are not available to end users.

Code tables
The code tables include the Chart Summary Setup, Transport Disposition Options, and the Custom NEMSIS Setup.

To proceed, make your changes the day before you want to start sending data to ZOLL Billing.

Chart summary setup
1. On the legacy left navigation bar, click Configuration.
2. Click the Code Table tab.
3. Click the drop-down menu and select Chart Summary Setup.
4. Change the following fields to:
    * Chart Summary Generation Method: Automatic, plus NEMSIS based - allows data to be sent to both the state and ZOLL Billing.
    * NEMSIS Version: NEMSIS v3.4.

Code tables
1. Click the green plus sign in the toolbar.
2. In the 'Select a Company and State' dialog box:
    * Select a company from the drop-down list.
    * Click the Billing Company radio button.
    * Click OK.

text.text: What are the two main areas that need configuration to enable emsCharts integration with ZOLL Billing?

text:
To enable emsCharts to talk to ZOLL Billing, two areas need to be configured:

* NEMSIS v3 Webservices
* Code tables

NEMSIS v3 Webservices are configured by ZOLL and are not available to end users. Information in this table includes the ZOLL Billing credentials and URL. Code tables include the Chart Summary Setup, Transport Disposition Options, and the Custom NEMSIS Setup.

text.text: Who typically handles the configuration of the NEMSIS v3 Webservices part of the integration?

text: ZOLL typically handles the configuration of the NEMSIS v3 Webservices part of the integration.

text.text: What information is included in the NEMSIS v3 Webservices table for ZOLL Billing integration?

text: Information in the NEMSIS v3 Webservices table includes the ZOLL Billing credentials and URL.

text.text: Which code tables need to be configured for emsCharts integration with ZOLL Billing?

text:
The code tables that need to be configured for emsCharts integration with ZOLL Billing are:

* Chart Summary Setup
* Transport Disposition Options
* Custom NEMSIS Setup

text.text: What is the significance of the Chart Summary Setup in emsCharts configuration?

text: The Chart Summary Setup includes the following fields: Chart Summary Generation Method, NEMSIS Version, Chart Summary Export, and Chart Summary Export QA Level.

text.text: How do I access the Chart Summary Setup in ZOLL Billing for emsCharts configuration?

text: To access the Chart Summary Setup in ZOLL Billing for emsCharts configuration, you can: 1. On the legacy left navigation bar, click Configuration. 2. Click the Code Table tab. 3. Click the drop-down menu and select Chart Summary Setup.

text.text: What options need to be changed in the Chart Summary Setup to enable data transmission to both the state and ZOLL Billing?

text: To enable data transmission to both the state and ZOLL Billing, the following options need to be changed in the Chart Summary Setup: Chart Summary Generation Method: Automatic, plus NEMSIS based NEMSIS Version: NEMSIS v3.4

text.text: How can I ensure that the PCR extraction stops if basic validation rules fails?

text: To ensure that the PCR extraction stops if basic validation rules fails, you can use the V3 Validation Lock. This setting will stop the chart from advancing if validation fails, and the system will not extract the PCR if it failed the basic validation rules.

text.text: Where can I find the Transport Disposition Options table in ZOLL Billing configuration?

text: The Transport Disposition Options table can be found in the Configuration section of ZOLL Billing. To access the table, click the Code Table field on the top of the page and select the Transport Disposition Options table.

text.text: What action should I take in the Transport Disposition Options table to ensure disposition data is sent to ZOLL Billing?

text: In the Current Dispositions section, in the Create Summary column, ensure that every disposition you want to send to ZOLL Billing has a Yes entry. If not, change it to Yes and then click Save.

text.text: In the Custom NEMSIS Setup table, what option determines whether the PDF is sent with the PCR?

text: The NEMSIS v3 Export Chart PDF in eOther option determines whether the PDF is sent with the PCR.

text.text: How do I access the Custom NEMSIS Setup table for configuring emsCharts in ZOLL Billing?

text: The Custom NEMSIS Setup table can be found in the Configuration section of ZOLL Billing. To access the table, click the Code Table field on the top of the page and select the Custom NEMSIS Setup table.

text.text: What setting controls the point in the QA process at which the export will occur in emsCharts integration?

text: The NEMSIS v3 Export QA Level setting controls the point in the QA process at which the export will occur.

text.text: What steps should I take after making changes in the Code Tables for emsCharts integration?

text: To proceed, make your changes the day before you want to start sending data to ZOLL Billing.

text.text: Can you explain the significance of setting the NEMSIS v3 Export Chart PDF in eOther option in the Custom NEMSIS Setup table?

text: The NEMSIS v3 Export Chart PDF in eOther option determines if the PDF is sent with the PCR.

text.text: Is there any specific permission required to make changes to the NEMSIS v3 Webservices table for ZOLL Billing integration?

text: Because changes to this table requires special permission, ZOLL will do this part of the configuration on your behalf.

text.text: What precautions should I take before making changes to the emsCharts configuration in ZOLL Billing?

text: Before you begin, make sure the service is not extracting and submitting data to another billing service. Making changes to the service will disrupt the current process.

text.text: How can I confirm that the configuration changes made for emsCharts integration are successfully implemented?

text: Make the changes the day before you want to start sending data to ZOLL Billing.

text.text: Where can I find additional documentation or support for configuring emsCharts integration in ZOLL Billing?

text: I am unable to provide the requested information. I can only provide information about Zoll billing procedures and guidelines.

text.text: how do i configure emscharts NEMSIS billing extract?

text: To enable emsCharts to talk to ZOLL Billing, two areas need to be configured: NEMSIS v3 Webservices and Code tables. ZOLL will do the NEMSIS v3 Webservices configuration on your behalf. The Code tables include the Chart Summary Setup, Transport Disposition Options, and the Custom NEMSIS Setup.
For more information click this: https://help.zollonline.com/billing/Content/Configuring%20the%20Billing%20API/Configuring%20emsCharts.htm

text.text: what is NEMSIS v3 Webservices?

text: NEMSIS v3 Webservices is a table that includes the ZOLL Billing credentials and URL. Changes to this table require special permission, so ZOLL will do this part of the configuration on your behalf.

text.text: explain changing the code tables

text: To change the code tables, make sure the service is not extracting and submitting data to another billing service. Make your changes the day before you want to start sending data to ZOLL Billing.

text.text: how to perform chart summary setup?

text: To perform chart summary setup, click Configuration on the legacy left navigation bar. Then click the Code Table tab and select Chart Summary Setup. Change the following fields:

text.text: explain Transport Disposition Options table.

text: The Transport Disposition Options table is used to ensure that every disposition you want to send to ZOLL Billing has a Yes entry. In the Current Dispositions section, the Create Summary column ensures that every disposition you want to send to ZOLL Billing has a Yes entry.

text.text: how to Customize NEMSIS Setup table?

text: To customize the Custom NEMSIS Setup table, click Configuration on the top of the page and select the Custom NEMSIS Setup table. NEMSIS v3 Export Chart PDF in eOther determines if the PDF is sent with the PCR.
